class_notes: GH MPH Infectious Disease Concentration students enrollment only through 11.01.  All others may enroll beginning AFTER 11.01.
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530. Offers an epidemiological, clinical and public health perspective of selected acute infectious diseases of current national and international interest. Emphasizes the agent, methods of transmission, the host, role of surveillance, and methods of control and prevention.
schedule_location: W 8am-9:50am in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R100
sections: Class Nbr: 2068, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 8-9:50a, Instructor: Bednarczyk/Mitchum, Status: Open
